title: Pixel 5 - no service with Fizz and Fido - Canada
content:
Hello,

With my new Pixel 5, I'm not able to get any GSM network working. Even if I choose LTE / 3G / 2G I always have the "no service" message and a little cross on my empty network status icon. (I'm not speaking about data). I don't have any 5G sim card.

I already performed 3 factory reset, network setting reset, nothing works. I'm very confused about that.
Also when I let my sim card inside and factory reset my phone, it bootloops during the Wifi search step maybe 4 or 5 times before showing me some wifi network. Works well without sim card.

Other network stuff like Wifi and Bluetooth works "well".

Any idea ? Do I mess something ?!
Thanks
